   - Atlético de San Juan FC (2008)
   - Bayamón FC (2009)
   - Fajardo FC (2010)
   - Guaynabo Fluminense FC (2002)
   - Gigantes de Carolina FC / Boca Juniors Carolina FC (1998)
   - Puerto Rico Islanders FC (2003)
   - CF Tornados de Humacao (1994)

3. We then determine how many teams were founded before 1970:
   - Academia Quintana FC (1969) was founded before 1970
   - Gigantes de Carolina FC / Boca Juniors Carolina FC (1998) was also founded before 1970

4. Since two teams were found to have been founded before 1970, we must check if the claim allows for more than one team.

5. According to the claim, "only 1 team be found before 1970", it is clear that this does not account for multiple teams since there are indeed more than one (two) in our findings above

6. Therefore, the statement provided cannot be true because the facts confirm more than one was founded prior to 1970
